mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled: SPECIAL FEATURES "Contra", "Homes for Square Dancing", "British Festival at Beaulieu Abbey", "Basics 21 through 30", "A Teaching Help for the Basics", "Blind Students Dance in Alabama", "Americana: Cindy", "The Caller's Taw", and "The Importance of Youth in Square Dancing". REGULAR FEATURES: "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "What They are Wearing", "Ladies on the Square: Theme Costumes", "The Square Dance Picture", "Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: "Decko" Deck", "Paging the Roundancers: Betty Jayne and Tom Johnston", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
